title: WTB: T206 Kid Elberfeld (N.Y. Port.) in high grade
author: CMIZ5290

posts.post_title: WTB: T206 Kid Elberfeld (N.Y. Port.) in high grade
posts.post_content: Looking for a 7 or higher, PSA or SGC....thanks
Good luck in your search Kevin. That's a sweet looking card in a high grade.

I agree with Vincent. Here is a scan of my 6 for others to enjoy. If it wasn't for a ding in the upper-left corner it may have made a 7-8. Still, it is one of the sharpest cards in my collection.

Best of luck in your search.

Joe
